title: WeRent
description: It's a first-year student project. I've created a booking website called WeRent, which allows users to book various types of accommodations such as houses, villas, and apartments. In addition to using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for the site's structure and interactivity, I've also employed PHP and MySQL to manage the database and server-side functionalities. Thanks to these technologies, WeRent offers a smooth and efficient booking experience for users.

title: Mini-Blog
description: It's a second-year student project. I've created a mini-blog website that allows users to read and write posts. The site is built using the MVC (Model-View-Controller) architecture, which separates the application's logic, data, and presentation layers. This structure makes the code more organized and maintainable, enabling me to add new features and functionalities easily. With the mini-blog, users can share their thoughts and ideas with others in a user-friendly and intuitive interface.
